TopicTitle: Attempts 1 to 5: Getting To Orbit In KSP DEMO

Articles.Content:
Well. I tried to get into orbit in KSP Demo (0.22). And with the annoying SAS system it was a struggle =. You can go my Youtube channel and find all my attempts. It was a disaster. BUT FUN all the matter! 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ9fQPVeOGopjD7IfONUU4g/playlists

Just go to my playlists and click the one with Attempts to orbit (icon should be an old looking rocket).
